episodes.title: EX-CULT MEMBER Struggles to Maintain Relationships with Family | Matt Dillahunty & Paulogia
episodes.description:
Original Episode Here: https://youtube.com/live/nX7OTZqVn_E

Sam from North Carolina shares their complex journey of religious deconstruction after being raised in a fundamentalist cult. Now becoming more agnostic, they struggle to maintain relationships with deeply religious parents while hiding their true beliefs, non-binary identity, and bisexuality. Matt and Paulogia discuss setting healthy boundaries, finding support systems, and navigating family relationships during faith transitions. The hosts share personal experiences managing similar situations and recommend resources like "Recovering from Religion." A thoughtful exploration of family dynamics, religious trauma, and the challenge of being authentic while preserving important relationships.

episodes.title: From Catholic to Cult to Free Thinker: A Journey of Hope | Shannon Q & Paulogia
episodes.description:
Original Episode Here: https://youtube.com/live/6WW6gO5yLJE

Caller Xavier opens up about his ongoing journey of religious deconstruction. While he's rejected religious doctrine, he grapples with maintaining a sense of wonder and connection to something greater. Using examples from the recent Wonka film to simple acts like wishing on eyelashes, the conversation explores how to separate comforting rituals from truth claims. The hosts provide guidance on maintaining intellectual honesty while being gentle with oneself during the deconstruction process. Xavier also shares how his views on issues like abortion evolved, demonstrating how questioning religious beliefs can lead to broader philosophical growth.
